Title: GNU IDN Library 2: Multiple vulnerabilities
Synopsis:
Multiple vulnerabilities have been found in GNU IDN Library 2, the
    worst of which could result in the remote execution of arbitrary code.

Background.Text: GNU IDN Library 2 is an implementation of the IDNA2008 + TR46 specifications (RFC 5890, RFC 5891, RFC 5892, RFC 5893, TR 46).

Description.Text: Multiple vulnerabilities have been discovered in GNU IDN Library 2. Please review the CVE identifiers referenced below for details.

Impact.Text: A remote attacker could send specially crafted input, possibly resulting in execution of arbitrary code with the privileges of the process, impersonation of domains or a Denial of Service condition.

Workaround.Text: There is no known workaround at this time.

P.Text: All GNU IDN Library 2 users should upgrade to the latest version:
